title: Alessandra Ambrosio displays her frame in a crop top and leggings as she takes her dogs for a stroll
text:
She has flaunted her physique on endless runways and modelling campaigns.

And Alessandra Ambrosio proved that her sensational frame isn't without hard work, as she headed to the gym and enjoyed a dog walk in Los Angeles on Monday.

The Victoria's Secret model, 38, looked incredible in a black crop top which was printed with a 'gold's gym' motif on the front of the garment.

Casual: Alessandra Ambrosio proved that her sensational frame isn't without hard work, as she headed to the gym and enjoyed a dog walk in Los Angeles on Monday

Alessandra teamed her crop top with a pair of skintight gym leggings, while layering her look with a leopard print hoodie which she tied around her waist.

The model kept it casual in a pair of simple black flip flops, and carried her belongings in an oversized black leather bag with silver accents.

She wore her brunette locks up in a half-up half-down style, and showcased her naturally radiant complexion by going make-up free for the outing.

Chilling: The Victoria's Secret model, 38, looked incredible in a black crop top which was printed with a 'gold's gym' motif on the front of the garment

Stepping out: Alessandra teamed her crop top with a pair of skintight gym leggings, while layering her look with a leopard print hoodie which she tied around her waist

Alessandra was later spotted out and about again as she walked her two pups through Brentwood, ensuring they were well exercised for the day.

She shielded her eyes from the morning rays with a pair of stylish black shades.

On the professional front, Alessandra has just been announced as they new face of the Pretty Ballerinas Spring/Summer 2020 campaign.

Loved-up: Alessandra's relationship with beau Nicolo Oddi is hotting up as the pair have been nearly inseparable and have been spotted at a number of events

Looking good: The model kept it casual in a pair of simple black flip flops, and carried her belongings in an oversized black leather bag with silver accents

In stunning promotional shots for the brand, Alessandra looked incredible in a flowing red satin gown which she teamed with a pair of red ballet pumps.

Elsewhere, Alessandra's relationship with beau Nicolo Oddi is hotting up as the pair have been nearly inseparable and have been spotted at a number of events.

Alessandra and Alanui founder Nicolo were first linked in July 2018, when they were seen getting close at the HQ2 Nightclub in Atlantic City, according to Page Six.

Model looks: On the professional front, Alessandra has just been announced as they new face of the Pretty Ballerinas Spring/Summer 2020 campaign

'The two were very affectionate with each other, kissing and, when she wasn't dancing, they had their arms around each other,' a source told the site at the time.

Prior to her relationship with Nicolo, Alessandra was engaged to the father of her children, Jamie Mazur, 38, for ten years.

The couple split in March of last year, though they reportedly have an amicable relationship due to their two shared children Anja and Noah, six.

Lady in red! In stunning promotional shots for the brand, Alessandra looked incredible in a flowing red satin gown which she teamed with a pair of red ballet pumps
description: The Victoria's Secret model, 38, looked incredible in a black crop top which was printed with a 'gold's gym' motif on the front of the garment.
